message.content:
1. There was a surgery group.
2. Quality of life improved in the surgery group at six months.
3. The improvement in quality of life was more in the surgery group compared to other groups.
4. Satisfaction rates were high in the surgery group.

messages.content:
Statement: At six months, quality of life improved more in the surgery group and satisfaction rates were high.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
